name: I'll cut anyone who comes near.
Take your hands off my merchandise.
Looks like those bugs are after that shopkeeper.
She looks like she can handle herself though.
Are you really going to leave her?
Looks like we can sneak our way though without getting noticed.
She just said she'll cut anyone who comes near!
Then we'll take her goods then?
Anyway we have a few options. I'm down to fight or sneak past.
